translations: n.堰，坝；鱼梁（指拦截游鱼的枝条篱）
n.（Weir）人名；（德、西、葡）魏尔；（英、爱）韦尔

sentences.sentence: "Encapsulation protects cells from getting killed by the immune system and would contain teratoma cells," says Weir.
sentences.translation: “封装能保护细胞免遭免疫系统攻击，并且会含有畸胎瘤细胞。” Weir 说。

sentences.sentence: It has been spelled weir and wier, and in modern dialects, wair and ware have been attested, pointing to various pronunciations.
sentences.translation: 它曾被拼写为 weir 和 wier，且在现代方言中，wair 和 ware 也被证实，指的是各种不同的发音。

sentences.sentence: Weir had Lasik surgery about 2 years ago.
sentences.translation: 威尔两年前做了镭射视力矫正手术。
